title: BIR Form 2552 — Percentage Tax Return (Shares of Stock)

fields.label: 1. Date of Transaction or Listing
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY (date of stock transaction or LSE listing).

fields.label: 2. Amended Return?
fields.summary: Tick Yes if correcting a prior return; otherwise No.

fields.label: 3. Number of Sheets Attached
fields.summary: Write number of extra schedules/attachments submitted.

fields.label: 4. Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN)
fields.summary: Write TIN (9–12 digits).

fields.label: 5. RDO Code
fields.summary: Write assigned RDO code.

fields.label: 6. Name of Stockbroker/Issuing Corporation
fields.summary: For individual: Last, First, Middle. For corporation: Registered Name.

fields.label: 7. Registered Address
fields.summary: Write complete address. If branch, write branch address.

fields.label: 7A. ZIP Code
fields.summary: Write ZIP code.

fields.label: 8. Contact Number
fields.summary: Write mobile/landline number.

fields.label: 9. Email Address
fields.summary: Write valid email address.

fields.label: 10. Availing of Tax Relief under Special Law or Treaty?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, specify the law or treaty.

fields.label: 11. Kind of Transaction
fields.summary: Tick: • Shares listed/traded in LSE • Initial Public Offering (Primary/Secondary).

fields.label: 12. For Initial Public Offering
fields.summary: 12A: Write No. of Shares Sold/Exchanged. 12B: Write Total Outstanding Shares after Listing.

fields.label: 13. Tax Due (Schedule 1, PT 200)
fields.summary: Carry from Part V Schedule 1 Item 6.

fields.label: 14. Tax Due (Schedule 2, PT 201)
fields.summary: Carry from Part V Schedule 2 Item 6.

fields.label: 15. Tax Due (Schedule 3, PT 202)
fields.summary: Carry from Part V Schedule 3 Item 6.

fields.label: 16. TOTAL TAX DUE
fields.summary: Add Items 13–15.

fields.label: 17. Tax Paid in Previously Filed Return
fields.summary: If amended, write prior payment.

fields.label: 18. Creditable Tax Withheld (BIR Form 2307)
fields.summary: Write amount of creditable withholding tax claimed.

fields.label: 19. Total Tax Credits/Payments
fields.summary: Sum of Items 17 and 18.

fields.label: 20. Total Tax Still Due/(Overpayment)
fields.summary: Subtract Item 19 from Item 16.

fields.label: 21–23. Penalties
fields.summary: Write surcharge, interest, and compromise penalties, if any.

fields.label: 24. Total Penalties
fields.summary: Sum of Items 21–23.

fields.label: 25. TOTAL AMOUNT PAYABLE/(OVERPAYMENT)
fields.summary: Add Item 20 + Item 24. Tick box if overpayment: Refund or Tax Credit Certificate.

fields.label: 26. Cash/Bank Debit Memo
fields.summary: Write drawee bank, code, date, and amount.

fields.label: 27. Check
fields.summary: Write bank, code, date, and check amount.

fields.label: 28. Tax Debit Memo
fields.summary: Write bank, code, date, and amount.

fields.label: 29. Others (Specify)
fields.summary: Write details of other payment modes.

sections.title: Part IV – Summary of Transactions Not Subject to Tax

fields.label: Transaction Classification & Amount
fields.summary: List classifications and corresponding amounts.

sections.title: Part V – Details of Taxable Transactions

fields.label: Schedule 1 – Sale/Exchange via LSE
fields.summary: List Date, Seller, Buyer, Issuing Corporation, No. of Shares, Tax Base, Tax Rate, Tax Due.

fields.label: Schedule 2 – Sale/Exchange via Primary Public Offering
fields.summary: List Date, Seller, Buyer, Issuing Corporation, No. of Shares, Tax Base, Tax Rate, Tax Due.

fields.label: Schedule 3 – Sale/Exchange via Secondary Public Offering
fields.summary: List Date, Seller, Buyer, Issuing Corporation, No. of Shares, Tax Base, Tax Rate, Tax Due.

sections.title: Part VI – Details of Transactions Not Subject to Percentage Tax

fields.label: List Non-Taxable Transactions
fields.summary: For each: Date, Seller, Buyer, Issuing Corporation, No. of Shares.

fields.label: Taxpayer/Authorized Representative
fields.summary: Sign above printed name; write title/designation and TIN.

fields.label: Non-Individual (Corp/Org)
fields.summary: Signature of President/Vice President/Authorized Officer with Title and TIN.

fields.label: Tax Agent Accreditation/Attorney’s Roll No.
fields.summary: If applicable, write number, date of issue and expiry.
